attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: at the moment great britain has spaces for approximately eighty thousand prisoners, in a country of approximately sixty million people it is totally unacceptable to have so little room. I am petitioning for a tripling of prison spaces and it one thing I would be delighted to pay higher taxes for, the successive goverments appear to have been selling off prisons and privatizing the system. It is illogical finance as although it does cut out the expense at the immediate accounting level it has resulted in significantly higher police hours and manpower, public discontent by rising criminality, criminals gaining confidence in the systems inability to imprison them excepting the most extreme crimes. I hereby submit this to the public.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
